Name: Rachel
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water and drizzle crème de cassis on surface of drink
Review: Subtle lychee notes shine through this long refreshing cocktail with cognac, lemon and a drizzle of crème de cassis.
History: Created in 2015 by Schwarz Hiltraut, France using Martell V.S.O.P. cognac, this cocktail is named after Jean Martell's wife.
Nutrition: One serving of Rachel contains 136 calories
